title: RPG道具指令绑定问题
author: 煽火点风
txt_content: 做了个RPG移动分组的道具，指令怎么打可以实现让玩家右键这个道具就被移到vip分组？

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content: rpgitem 物品 power command 0 right 右键移动到vip组 `manuadd {player} vip` *

replies.author: a1297866417
replies.txt_content: rpgitem 物品 power command 0 right 右键成为VIP `manuadd {player} vip` *

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
/rpgitem 物品 power command 0 right 右键移动到vip组 `manuadd {player} vip` manager.manuadd
/rpgitem 物品 power command 0 right 右键移动到vip组 `manuadd {player} vip` groupmanager.manuadd
用不了*
